name: Bedrooms on the Moon
description:
Welcome to the Moon, a place full of fantastical horny guys that need your help!

Sex as an abstract mix of Runner and Rhythm:

Move your character up and down through moving tracks that represent your client's preferences! Avoid obstacles that represent their dislikes and move or click throught their likes for a job well done. The better you do that the more known you'll be, getting more contacts in your client list! Experience 9 unique levels and characters!

Oh, and see your character go up and down on your client's dick as you do it!

Get to know the locals:

Learn about the characters through the text messages they send to you before each encounter. As you interact with them you get to see their dialogue change!

Character customization:

Your character is a shapeshifter, so feel free to customize your appearance between levels! Mix and match bodyparts and colors to create the perfect body for you, experiment with different humanoid species or mix and match to create a hot chimera man! You have 11 different head options, as well as separate options for snout, mouth, neck, arms, torso, legs, dicks and balls!

Create your own levels:

Show your passion and creativity with the in-game level editor! Create levels by using 7 different object types to add to the tracks however you want and importing images for the client and background!
